_comment: Maps real-world EPUBs from the corpus to their known validation issues. Used to track which checks fire on real-world content and to detect regressions when upgrading epubcheck or modifying the check registry.

standard-ebooks.description: Standard Ebooks: high-quality, well-structured EPUB 3 files. Should validate cleanly.

gutenberg.description: Project Gutenberg: auto-generated EPUB 3. Common source of OPF and metadata warnings.

feedbooks.description: Feedbooks: public domain EPUB 3. Different toolchain than Gutenberg.

internet-archive.description: Internet Archive: diverse digitization pipelines, widest variety of issues.

epub3-samples.description: IDPF/W3C reference samples. Should mostly validate cleanly.

epub-testsuite.description: W3C EPUB conformance test documents. Mix of valid and intentionally invalid.
